metadata.feature_description: Client-side page management interface with React components

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Content > Pages panel
steps.expected: Pages panel loads with page tree visible
steps.actual: Pages panel loaded successfully showing hierarchical tree structure with Home page and child pages

steps.action: Click EXPAND ALL button to expand all tree nodes
steps.expected: All page tree branches expand to show nested pages
steps.actual: All branches expanded successfully, showing full page hierarchy including Activity Feed, My Dashboard, File Tracking, etc.

steps.action: Click on a page in the tree to select it
steps.expected: Page is selected and details panel updates
steps.actual: News page selected successfully, details panel updated to show page name, URL, status (Visible) and other properties

steps.action: Drag 'Boards' page and drop it under 'HubSpot Forms Test' page
steps.expected: Page is moved to new location in tree hierarchy
steps.actual: Boards page successfully moved under HubSpot Forms Test. Tree structure updated, breadcrumb changed to 'Home / HubSpot Forms Test / Boards', and success notification appeared

steps.expected: UI adapts to mobile view with responsive layout
steps.actual: UI successfully adapted to mobile view. Page tree remained functional with scrollable list, navigation changed to show 'Menu' link, controls adjusted for smaller screen

steps.action: Select different pages in tree and observe details panel updates
steps.expected: Details panel updates in real-time without page refresh
steps.actual: Details panel updated immediately when selecting different pages, showing page name, URL, visibility status without requiring page refresh

steps.action: Perform drag and drop operation and observe tree update
steps.expected: Tree structure updates in real-time after drag-drop
steps.actual: Tree structure immediately reflected the new page location, breadcrumb updated in real-time, success notification appeared without page refresh

steps.action: Clear page name field and attempt to save
steps.expected: Validation error message displays for required field
steps.actual: Validation error appeared immediately: 'Page Name is Required.' with red highlight on the name field

steps.expected: Error/empty state message displays for no results
steps.actual: Search results showed 'NO PAGE FOUND.' message with action buttons disabled (VIEW PAGE, EDIT PAGE greyed out)

steps.action: Observe UI behavior during search operations
steps.expected: Loading indicators appear during async operations
steps.actual: Brief loading state observed during search execution. The UI responded quickly, showing search results appeared promptly. Initial page load also showed loading before tree rendered.

observations: Code includes mobile-specific initialization functions (initMobile, loadMobile) in both Pages.js and EvoqPages.js
Page hierarchy manager includes automatic resize handling via _resizeContentContainer function
React components registered for LinkTracking, Workflow, Templates, and ViewSelector provide modular UI architecture
Drag and drop uses custom templates via setDragItemTemplate for consistent UX
Page thumbnails feature integrated with automatic thumbnail loading/updating
